name: Expanded Spell List (The Great Old One)

description.value:
The Great Old One lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Great Old One Expanded Spells

Spell Level Spells
1st @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.IAP3DSC2U4ZESJ7Y]{Dissonant Whispers}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.BQk5Row4NymMnUQl]{Hideous Laughter}
2nd @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.ppWAAEul0QHtm4er]{Detect Thoughts}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.U8S7C36ECFRJ7FVY]{Phantasmal Force}
3rd @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.cg50KpBkBdPK6vPL]{Clairvoyance}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.GtGjNjPBgUHxGYAD]{Sending}
4th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.LrPvWHBPmiMQQsKB]{Dominate Beast}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.DGONTFbk5eORs5qv]{Black Tentacles}
5th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.91Sw6vOIaO7U8DvM]{Dominate Person}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.HQfd7jJyULIoGxrZ]{Telekinesis}
